statements: SELECT * FROM WeatherInfo WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT location, temperature FROM WeatherInfo WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherInfo WHERE humidity < 70 AND wind_speed > 10 ORDER BY humidity DESC
SELECT temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherInfo WHERE location = 'San Francisco' AND temperature BETWEEN 15 AND 30
SELECT * FROM WeatherInfo WHERE location LIKE 'L%'
SELECT location, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherInfo WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM WeatherInfo WHERE wind_speed > 15 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT location, temperature FROM WeatherInfo WHERE humidity > 80
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM WeatherInfo
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM WeatherInfo
SELECT * FROM WeatherInformation;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherInformation WHERE temperature > 20;
SELECT location, precipitation FROM WeatherInformation WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM WeatherInformation;
SELECT location, longitude, elevation FROM GeographicalData ORDER BY elevation DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherInformation WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, precipitation FROM WeatherInformation WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY precipitation ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM WeatherInformation GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(temperature) > 20;
SELECT date, location, temperature FROM WeatherInformation WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM WeatherInformation JOIN GeographicalData ON WeatherInformation.location = GeographicalData.location WHERE GeographicalData.elevation > 1000;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT humidity, temperature FROM weather_data ORDER BY humidity DESC
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM geographical_data WHERE altitude < 500 ORDER BY latitude ASC
SELECT crop_name, crop_yield FROM agriculture_data WHERE soil_type = 'Clay'
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE wind_speed <= 10 ORDER BY weather_id
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY humidity ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM geographical_data WHERE altitude < 1000 ORDER BY location_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT crop_name, crop_yield FROM agriculture_data WHERE soil_type = 'clay' ORDER BY crop_yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data JOIN geographical_data ON weather_data.weather_id = geographical_data.location_id WHERE altitude > 500 AND temperature < 30 ORDER BY wind_speed ASC;
SELECT record_id, soil_type FROM agriculture_data WHERE crop_yield > 1000 ORDER BY record_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT city_name, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData
SELECT city_name, longitude, latitude, elevation FROM GeographicalData
SELECT crop_name, planting_season, harvest_season FROM CropDetails
SELECT city_name, owner_name FROM FarmInformation
SELECT city_name, wind_speed FROM WeatherData
SELECT city_name, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY city_name DESC;
SELECT city_name, latitude, longitude FROM GeographicalData WHERE latitude < 30 AND longitude > 70 ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT city_name, temperature, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE wind_speed < 3.5 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_season, harvest_season FROM CropDetails WHERE planting_season = 'Spring' ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT farm_id, owner_name, city_name FROM FarmInformation WHERE owner_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY farm_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0.5;
SELECT date, precipitation FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature FROM weather_data;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY temperature DESC, date ASC
SELECT date, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 0.3 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity > 0.6 ORDER BY precipitation DESC
SELECT date, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 0.5 ORDER BY date ASC
